name: Bowie Is Lost
description:
This is a game about a boy that loses it's dog, Bowie, in the woods. The boy goes on a quest to find him and strange thing begin to appear.

The game focus primarly on the environment and the feeling of the player while exploring it.

Its still a prototype that I created with music made by my brother, it's just the first level. Give me your feedback so I can improve it!

Follow me on youtube if you would like to see more! 

https://www.youtube.com/user/Gypelayo

And my brother on soundcloud!

https://soundcloud.com/gustavo-pelayo-474879128
